```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(readr)
unzip("Consumer_Complaints_lemma.csv.zip") 
complaints <- read_csv("Consumer_Complaints_lemma.csv")
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tm)
library(wordcloud) 
library(dplyr)
words <- (as.character(complaints$Lemmatized)) %>%
  count(Lemmatized) %>%
  wordcloud(Lemmatized, n, max.words = 50)
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
stuff <- as.character(complaints$Lemmatized)
wordcloud(complaints$Lemmatized, max.words = 100)
```
